processGroups.name: owais- Twitter - Push tweets into HDFS

entry.value: insert into completedmandates (mandateRef,names,bdaAccount,branchCode,advisorCode,partnerCode ,entityType , mandate , shariah) values ("${mandateRef}","${names}","${bdaAccount}","${branchCode}" , "${advisorCode}" , "${partnerCode}" , "${entityType}" ,"${mandate}" , "${shariah}")

insert into sessions_datetime (mandateRef , starthere_status , starttime , personalInformation_time , p_mins , corporateInformation_time, contactInformation_time , addressInformation_time , bankInformation_time , employementDetail_time , taxDetail_time , investmentFundsDetail_time , mandateInformation_time, communicationPreferences_time , sourceOfWealth_time , sourceOfFunds_time , sourceOfIncome_time , legalDetail_time)
values
("${mandateRef}","${starthere_status}",NULLIF("${starttime}",''),NULLIF("${personalInformation_timw}",'') , -777 , NULLIF("${corporateInformation_time}",'') , NULLIF("${contactInformation_time}",''), NULLIF("${addressInformation_time}",'') , NULLIF("${bankInformation_time}",'') , NULLIF("${employementDetail_time}",'') , NULLIF("${taxDetail_time}",'') , NULLIF("${investmentFundsDetail_time}",'') , NULLIF("${mandateInformation_time}",'') , NULLIF("${communicationPreferences_time}",'') , NULLIF("${sourceOfWealth_time}",'') , NULLIF("${sourceOfFunds_time}",'') , NULLIF("${sourceOfIncome_time}",'') , NULLIF("${legalDetail_time}",'') )
#MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(${personalInformation_timw}","${starttime}"))
